title: [Bug]: Hidden chats option not available. No way to restore hidden chats.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

When I login to skype there is an option (when I click onto "Recent chats") which is called "hidden chats". This is not available in teams for linux. So the option "hide" is not reversible.

### What package are you using?

snap

### Version

1.13.2

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Right click on a Chat -> Hide
2. No way to restore back hidden chat. 

```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
Available section: "Hidden chats"

If the above is expected behavior, maybe there should be a warning message before hiding, like: "hiding will be permanent"
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
